message.raw:
* segway/data/segway-wrapper.sh: wrapper fixes stdout

* segway/run.py (Runner.world_track_indexes): add assertion

* segway/cluster/pbs.py:
(JobTemplateFactory.__init__): use template.outputPath = NULL_FILENAME

* segway/cluster/common.py:
(_JobTemplateFactory.__init__): use template.outputPath = NULL_FILENAME
(_JobTemplateFactory.make_args): add output_filename to segway-wrapper args
